options.name: Simple Text Message
options.description: Supports basic Markdown

options.name: Blocks
options.description: Combine text, buttons, form elements, dividers and more in Slack 's visual builder

properties.name: text
properties.description: The message text to post. Supports markdown by default - this can be disabled in "Options".

properties.name: blocksUi
properties.description: Enter the JSON output from Slack's visual Block Kit Builder here. You can then use expressions to add variable content to your blocks. To create blocks, use Slack's Block Kit Builder

properties.name: text
properties.description: Fallback text to display in slack notifications. Supports markdown by default - this can be disabled in "Options".

properties.name: noticeAttachments
properties.displayName: This is a legacy Slack feature. Slack advises to instead use Blocks.

options.name: fallback
options.description: Required plain-text summary of the attachment

options.name: color
options.description: Color of the line left of text

options.name: pretext
options.description: Text which appears before the message block

options.name: author_name
options.description: Name that should appear

options.name: author_icon
options.description: Icon which should appear for the user

options.name: footer
options.description: Text of footer to add

options.name: footer_icon
options.description: Icon which should appear next to footer

options.name: ts
options.description: Timestamp of the message to post

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to add to message

values.name: short
values.description: Whether items can be displayed next to each other

properties.name: otherOptions
properties.description: Other options to set

options.name: includeLinkToWorkflow
options.description: Whether to append a link to this workflow at the end of the message. This is helpful if you have many workflows sending Slack messages.

options.name: botProfile
options.description: Set an image or an emoji as the Profile Photo (avatar) of the bot sending the message. Will not be used if sending message as a user.

values.name: icon_emoji
values.description: Only used if sending message as a bot. Use emoji codes like +1, not an actual emoji like üëç. List of common emoji codes

values.name: icon_url
values.description: Only used if sending message as a bot

options.name: link_names
options.description: Whether to turn @users and #channels in message text into clickable links

options.name: thread_ts
options.description: Provide another message's Timestamp value to make this message a reply

values.name: thread_ts
values.description: Message timestamps are included in output data of Slack nodes, abbreviated to ts

values.name: reply_broadcast
values.description: Whether the reply should be made visible to everyone in the channel or conversation

options.name: mrkdwn
options.description: Whether to use Slack Markdown to format the message

options.name: unfurl_links
options.description: Whether to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content

options.name: unfurl_media
options.description: Whether to disable unfurling of media content

options.name: ephemeral
options.description: Whether to send a temporary, ephemeral message

values.name: fieldLabel

values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-filled in the form field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default date value that will be pre-filled in the form field (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-selected. Must match one of the option labels.

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.displayName: Multiple Choice is a legacy option, please use Checkboxes or Radio Buttons field type instead
values.name: multiselectLegacyNotice
multiselect

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes

values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

options.description: Whether to show truncated file info for files hidden due to being too old, and the team who owns the file being over the file limit

options.name: tsFrom
options.description: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive)

options.name: tsTo
options.description: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive)

options.name: types
options.description: Filter files by type

options.name: userId
options.description: Filter files created by a single user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
